document_title: Security update for SUSE Linux Enterprise Server Docker images

document_notes.text: Security update for SUSE Linux Enterprise Server Docker images
document_notes.title: Topic

document_notes.text:
This update for the SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 and 12 SP1 Docker images
provides the latest security patches for openldap2, glibc and openssl (bsc#982831).
